sqlMap.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT LPAD('ㄴ', LVL*4, ' ') || A.DOC_NM AS DOC_LVL , A.DOC_NM , B.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.DOC_ID , A.UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '2') AS UP_DOC_NM , (SELECT UPPER_DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 Z JOIN (SELECT PRJ_ID,LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000) C ON(Z.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) WHERE C.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.DOC_ID = A.UPPER_DOC_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS TWO_UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '3') AS UPUP_DOC_NM , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.DOC_DESC , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FORM_CONF_FILE_ID , A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DOC_WAIT_FILE_ID , A.DOC_CONF_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') as USE_NM , A.SIGN_USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00021', A.SIGN_USE_CD, '1') as SIGN_USE_NM , '' AS ROW_STATUS FROM PRJ3000 A , PRJ1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) T START WITH T.DOC_ID = (SELECT DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 WHERE UPPER_DOC_ID IS NULL AND PRJ_ID = #prjId#) CONNECT BY PRIOR T.DOC_ID = T.UPPER_DOC_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY T.ORD ASC

SELECT B.LIC_GRP_ID , A.DOC_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '2') AS UPPER_DOC_NM , (SELECT UPPER_DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 Z JOIN (SELECT PRJ_ID,LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000) C ON(Z.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) WHERE C.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.DOC_ID = A.UPPER_DOC_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS TWO_UPPER_DOC_ID , SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '3') AS TWO_UPPER_DOC_NM , A.DOC_NM , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.DOC_DESC , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FORM_CONF_FILE_ID , A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DOC_WAIT_FILE_ID , A.DOC_CONF_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') as USE_NM , A.SIGN_USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00021', A.SIGN_USE_CD, '1') as SIGN_USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ3000 A JOIN ( SELECT PRJ_ID,LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000 ) B ON(A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ORDER BY ORD
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_DOC_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_DOC_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'DOC' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_DPT_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(DOC_ID) AS NEW_DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DOC_ID LIKE 'DOC' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO PRJ3000 A ( DOC_ID , UPPER_DOC_ID , DOC_NM , DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , DOC_FORM_CONF_FILE_ID , DOC_DESC , DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , DOC_WAIT_FILE_ID , LVL , ORD , DOC_ED_DTM , USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP , PRJ_ID , SIGN_USE_CD ) VALUES ( #newDocId# , null , '표준 산출물' , #docFormFileId# , #docFormConfFileId# , '시스템 ROOT' , #docAtchFileId# , #docWaitFileId# , 0 , 1 , null , '01' , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , #prjId# , '02' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DOC_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.UPPER_DOC_ID , A.DOC_NM , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.DOC_DESC , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FORM_CONF_FILE_ID , A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DOC_WAIT_FILE_ID , A.DOC_CONF_DESC , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , A.USE_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# ORDER BY ORD
SELECT NVL(MAX(A.ORD), 0) + 1 AS NEX_ORD FROM PRJ3000 A JOIN PRJ1000 B ON A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.UPPER_DOC_ID = #upperDocId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_DOC_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_DOC_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'DOC' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_DOC_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(DOC_ID) AS NEW_DOC_ID FROM PRJ3000 A JOIN PRJ1000 B ON A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DOC_ID LIKE 'DOC' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO PRJ3000 A ( PRJ_ID , DOC_ID , UPPER_DOC_ID , DOC_NM , DOC_DESC , LVL , ORD , DOC_ED_DTM , DOC_FORM_CONF_FILE_ID , DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , DOC_WAIT_FILE_ID , USE_CD , SIGN_USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId# , #newDocId# , #upperDocId# , #docNm# , #docDesc# , #lvl# + 1 , #ord# , #docEdDtm# , #docFormConfFileId# , #docFormFileId# , #docAtchFileId# , #docWaitFileId# , '01' , #signUseCd# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRJ3000 A SET MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# , DOC_ED_DTM = TO_DATE(REPLACE(#docEdDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') , USE_CD = #useCd# , DOC_NM = #docNm# , DOC_DESC = #docDesc# , ORD = #ord# , SIGN_USE_CD = #signUseCd# WHERE 1=1 AND (SELECT LIC_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000 WHERE PRJ_ID=#prjId#) = #licGrpId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ3000 WHERE 1 = 1 AND DOC_ID = #docId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNFILEDETAIL SET ATCH_FILE_ID = #afterFileId# , FILE_SN = #afterFileSn# WHERE 1 = 1 AND ATCH_FILE_ID = #beforeFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT LPAD('ㄴ', LVL*4, ' ') || A.DOC_NM AS DOC_LVL , A.DOC_NM , A.PRJ_ID , A.DOC_ID , A.UPPER_DOC_ID , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.DOC_DESC , A.DOC_FORM_FILE_ID , A.DOC_FORM_CONF_FILE_ID , A.DOC_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DOC_WAIT_FILE_ID , TO_CHAR(A.DOC_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_ED_DTM , A.USE_CD FROM (SELECT * FROM PRJ3000 WHERE PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND USE_CD = '01') A WHERE 1=1 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.DOC_ID = A.UPPER_DOC_ID START WITH A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.ORD ASC
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT T.* , ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM ,A.PRJ_GRP_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM ,A.DOC_ID ,SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '1') AS DOC_NM ,A.TARGET_ID ,B.REQ_NM AS TARGET_NM ,A.TARGET_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', A.TARGET_CD, '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,C.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM FROM PRJ3002 A INNER JOIN REQ4100 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = B.REQ_ID ) INNER JOIN STM3000 C ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.REG_USR_ID = C.USR_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.TARGET_CD = '01' UNION SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM ,A.PRJ_GRP_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM ,A.DOC_ID ,SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '1') AS DOC_NM ,A.TARGET_ID ,B.MEILSTONE_NAME AS TARGET_NM ,A.TARGET_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', A.TARGET_CD, '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,C.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM FROM PRJ3002 A INNER JOIN MIS1000 B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = B.MILESTONE_ID) INNER JOIN STM3000 C ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.REG_USR_ID = C.USR_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.TARGET_CD = '03' UNION SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM ,A.PRJ_GRP_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM ,A.DOC_ID ,SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '1') AS DOC_NM ,A.TARGET_ID ,B.SPR_NM AS TARGET_NM ,A.TARGET_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', A.TARGET_CD, '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,C.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM FROM PRJ3002 A INNER JOIN SPR1000 B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = B.SPR_ID) INNER JOIN STM3000 C ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.REG_USR_ID = C.USR_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.TARGET_CD = '04' UNION SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM ,A.PRJ_GRP_ID ,SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM ,A.DOC_ID ,SF_PRJ3000_DOC_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.DOC_ID, '1') AS DOC_NM ,A.TARGET_ID ,B.DPL_NM AS TARGET_NM ,A.TARGET_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', A.TARGET_CD, '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,C.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM FROM PRJ3002 A INNER JOIN DPL1000 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.TARGET_ID = B.DPL_ID ) INNER JOIN STM3000 C ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.REG_USR_ID = C.USR_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DOC_ID = #docId# AND A.TARGET_CD = '05' ) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.TARGET_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.TARGET_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T.REG_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T.REG_DTM = TO_DATE(#searchTargetData#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC , T.REG_DTM DESC

SELECT T.* , ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.REQ_ID AS TARGET_ID ,A.REQ_NM AS TARGET_NM ,'01' AS TARGET_CD ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', '01', '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,B.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM ,B.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.PRJ_ID FROM REQ4100 A LEFT JOIN PRJ3002 C ON (A.REQ_ID = C.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON (A.REG_USR_ID = B.USR_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID NOT IN ( SELECT A.REQ_ID FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN PRJ3002 B ON (A.REQ_ID = B.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.DOC_ID = #docId# )
UNION SELECT A.MILESTONE_ID AS TARGET_ID ,A.MEILSTONE_NAME AS TARGET_NM ,'03' AS TARGET_CD ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', '03', '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,B.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM ,B.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.PRJ_ID FROM MIS1000 A LEFT JOIN PRJ3002 C ON (A.MILESTONE_ID = C.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON (A.REG_USR_ID = B.USR_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.MILESTONE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT A.MILESTONE_ID FROM MIS1000 A INNER JOIN PRJ3002 B ON (A.MILESTONE_ID = B.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.DOC_ID = #docId# ) UNION SELECT A.SPR_ID AS TARGET_ID ,A.SPR_NM AS TARGET_NM ,'04' AS TARGET_CD ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', '04', '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,B.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM ,B.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.PRJ_ID FROM SPR1000 A LEFT JOIN PRJ3002 C ON (A.SPR_ID = C.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON (A.REG_USR_ID = B.USR_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID NOT IN ( SELECT A.SPR_ID FROM SPR1000 A INNER JOIN PRJ3002 B ON (A.SPR_ID = B.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.DOC_ID = #docId# ) UNION SELECT A.DPL_ID AS TARGET_ID ,A.DPL_NM AS TARGET_NM ,'05' AS TARGET_CD ,SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00022', '05', '1') AS TARGET_TYPE_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,B.USR_NM AS REG_USR_NM ,B.LIC_GRP_ID ,A.PRJ_ID FROM DPL1000 A LEFT JOIN PRJ3002 C ON (A.DPL_ID = C.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON (A.REG_USR_ID = B.USR_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID NOT IN ( SELECT A.DPL_ID FROM DPL1000 A INNER JOIN PRJ3002 B ON (A.DPL_ID = B.TARGET_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.DOC_ID = #docId# ) ) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND T.TARGET_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.TARGET_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T.REG_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC , T.REG_DTM DESC
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ3002 ( LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , DOC_ID , TARGET_ID , TARGET_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #prjGrpId# , #prjId# , #docId# , #targetId# , #targetCd# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ3002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND DOC_ID = #docId# AND TARGET_ID = #targetId#
